# MarketplaceV3DirectListings.isBuyerApprovedForListing() method

Check if a buyer is approved for a specific direct listing

## Example

\`\`\`javascript const listingId = 0; const isBuyerApproved = await contract.directListings.isBuyerApprovedForListing(listingId, "{{wallet\_address}}");

**Signature:**

```typescript
isBuyerApprovedForListing(listingId: BigNumberish, buyer: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description    |
| --------- | ------------ | -------------- |
| listingId | BigNumberish | the listing id |
| buyer     | string       | buyer address  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;
